channel.title: Context Engineering Daily
channel.description: Daily news and research updates in AI Context Engineering, Prompt Engineering, RAG, and LLM development

item.title: Context-Engineering - "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.
item.description: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> context window, prompt engineering, prompt, context | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)

item.title: ThinkSound - [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch implementation of [ThinkSound], a unified framework for generating audio from any modality, guided by Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning.
item.description: [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch implementation of [ThinkSound], a unified framework for generating audio from any modality, guided by Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> CoT, framework, chain-of-thought, audio, reasoning | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)

item.title: mcp-context-forge - A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. Converts REST API endpoints to MCP, composes virtual MCP servers with added security and observability, and converts between protocols (stdio, SSE, Streamable HTTP).
item.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. Converts REST API endpoints to MCP, composes virtual MCP servers with added security and observability, and converts between protocols (stdio, SSE, Streamable HTTP).<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> prompt, model, context, LLM, API | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)

item.title: Cline-Recursive-Chain-of-Thought-System-CRCT- - A framework designed to manage context, dependencies, and tasks in large-scale Cline projects within VS Code
item.description: A framework designed to manage context, dependencies, and tasks in large-scale Cline projects within VS Code<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> chain-of-thought, context, framework | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: LightRAG - [EMNLP2025] "LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation"
item.description: [EMNLP2025] "LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation"<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> retrieval, RAG, augmented | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)

item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> knowledge base, model, framework, vector, LLM | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)
